title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
description: Experience the power of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum. Formulated with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, it delivers results like Brightening, Fades dark spots. Perfect for Oily, Combination, it is the ultimate addition to your routine.
usage_instructions: Apply 2-3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
